channel.title: NYS:XOM on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:XOM on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Algeria Nears Deals With Exxon and Chevron in Shale Gas Push
item.description: Algeria is close to finalizing a deal with Exxon Mobil Corp. and Chevron Corp. to tap the North African nation’s vast gas reserves, including shale, for the first time, a senior official said.

item.title: Algeria Nears Deals With Exxon and Chevron in Shale Gas Push
item.description: Algeria is close to finalizing a deal with Exxon Mobil Corp. and Chevron Corp. to tap the North African nation’s vast gas reserves, including shale, for the first time, a senior official said.

item.title: Exxon Mobil Is on the Lookout For Acquisitions, CEO Woods Says
item.description: Exxon Mobil Corp. is looking for opportunities to acquire smaller rivals, a year after buying Pioneer Natural Resources Co. for $60 billion, Chief Executive Officer Darren Woods said.

item.title: Exxon Mobil Is on the Lookout For Acquisitions, CEO Woods Says
item.description: Exxon Mobil Corp. is looking for opportunities to acquire smaller rivals, a year after buying Pioneer Natural Resources Co. for $60 billion, Chief Executive Officer Darren Woods said.

item.title: Exxon, Chevron Surpass Estimates With Record Oil Production
item.description: Exxon Mobil Corp. and Chevron Corp. posted better-than-expected results after record oil production cushioned the impact of lower crude prices.

item.title: Exxon, Chevron Surpass Estimates With Record Oil Production
item.description: Exxon Mobil Corp. and Chevron Corp. posted better-than-expected results after record oil production cushioned the impact of lower crude prices.

item.title: FTC Tosses Orders Against Exxon, Chevron Board Appointments
item.description: The US Federal Trade Commission set aside orders barring the former Pioneer Natural Resources Co. chief executive officer from joining Exxon Mobil Corp.’s board and the CEO of Hess Corp. from joining
